SEARCH
Package de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.languagemanager.expressionengine

Klasse ExpressionEnginePool

java.lang.Object
de.happybavarian07.coolstufflib.languagemanager.expressionengine.ExpressionEnginePool
public class ExpressionEnginePool extends Object
ExpressionEnginePool manages the lifecycle and retrieval of ExpressionEngine instances for different language contexts and player-language associations. It avoids per-player engine bloat by using UUID-based mapping and provides efficient retrieval for both default and per-language engines. Player-to-engine mapping is used only as a cache for fast lookups.

Key design points:

  • Each language is mapped to a unique engine UUID and ExpressionEngine instance.
  • The default language engine is non-replaceable and always available.
  • Player-to-engine mapping is a cache, not a permanent per-player storage, to keep memory usage low.
  • Thread-safe via ConcurrentHashMap for all mappings.
  • Provides methods to add, retrieve, update, and clear engines by language or player context.
Usage:
  • Use getEngineForLanguage(String) for per-language engine retrieval.
  • Use getEngineForPlayer(Player, String) for player-language context retrieval, with fallback to default.
  • Use addEngineForLanguage(String, ExpressionEngine) to register a new engine for a language.
  • Use updatePlayerEngine(Player, String) to update a player's engine mapping when their language changes.
  • Use clearPlayerEngine(Player) and clearLanguageEngine(String) for cleanup.
  • Use registerGlobalFunction(String, FunctionCall, String) to register a function globally across all engines.
  • Use registerFunctionForLanguage(String, String, FunctionCall, String) to register a function for a specific language engine.
  • Use unregisterGlobalFunction(String) and unregisterFunctionForLanguage(String, String) to remove functions.
  • Use getEngineIterator() to iterate over all registered ExpressionEngines.
  • Use getDefaultLanguageEngine() to retrieve the default ExpressionEngine instance.
Seit:
2025-05-25
Autor:
HappyBavarian07

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ExpressionEnginePool

      public ExpressionEnginePool(String defaultLanguageName, ExpressionEngine defaultEngine)

      Creates a new pool for managing language-specific expression engines, setting up the default language and engine.

      
 ExpressionEnginePool pool = new ExpressionEnginePool("en", new ExpressionEngine());
      Parameter:
      defaultLanguageName - the name of the default language
      defaultEngine - the engine instance for the default language

  • Methodendetails

    • getDefaultLanguageEngine

      public ExpressionEngine getDefaultLanguageEngine()
      Gets the ExpressionEngine for the default language.
      Gibt zurück:
      The default ExpressionEngine instance.

    • getEngineForLanguage

      public ExpressionEngine getEngineForLanguage(String languageName)
      Gets the ExpressionEngine for a specific language.
      Parameter:
      languageName - The language name.
      Gibt zurück:
      The ExpressionEngine for the language, or the default engine if not found.

    • getEngineForPlayer

      public ExpressionEngine getEngineForPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String languageName)
      Gets the ExpressionEngine for a player and language context. Uses player-to-engine mapping as a cache for efficient lookups.
      Parameter:
      player - The player instance.
      languageName - The language name.
      Gibt zurück:
      The ExpressionEngine for the player-language context, or the default engine if not found.

    • addEngineForLanguage

      public UUID addEngineForLanguage(String languageName, ExpressionEngine engine)
      Registers a new ExpressionEngine for a language and returns its UUID. If the language already has an engine, returns the existing UUID.
      Parameter:
      languageName - The language name.
      engine - The ExpressionEngine to register.
      Gibt zurück:
      The UUID of the registered engine.

    • updatePlayerEngine

      public void updatePlayerEngine(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String languageName)
      Updates a player's engine mapping when their language changes.
      Parameter:
      player - The player instance.
      languageName - The new language name for the player.

    • clearPlayerEngine

      public void clearPlayerEngine(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Clears the cached engine mapping for a player.
      Parameter:
      player - The player whose cache should be cleared.

    • clearLanguageEngine

      public void clearLanguageEngine(String languageName)
      Removes the engine mapping for a language (except the default language).
      Parameter:
      languageName - The language name to remove.

    • registerGlobalFunction

      public void registerGlobalFunction(String functionName, FunctionCall function, String defaultType)
      Registers a global function for all ExpressionEngines.
      Parameter:
      functionName - The name of the function.
      function - The FunctionCall implementation.
      defaultType - The default type for the function.

    • registerFunctionForLanguage

      public void registerFunctionForLanguage(String languageName, String functionName, FunctionCall function, String defaultType)
      Registers a function for a specific language's ExpressionEngine.
      Parameter:
      languageName - The language name.
      functionName - The name of the function.
      function - The FunctionCall implementation.
      defaultType - The default type for the function.

    • unregisterGlobalFunction

      public void unregisterGlobalFunction(String functionName)
      Unregisters a global function from all ExpressionEngines.
      Parameter:
      functionName - The name of the function to unregister.

    • unregisterFunctionForLanguage

      public void unregisterFunctionForLanguage(String languageName, String functionName)
      Unregisters a function from a specific language's ExpressionEngine.
      Parameter:
      languageName - The language name.
      functionName - The name of the function to unregister.

    • getEngineIterator

      public Iterator<ExpressionEngine> getEngineIterator()
      Gets an iterator over all ExpressionEngines in the pool.
      Gibt zurück:
      An iterator for the ExpressionEngine instances.

    • peekVariable

      public Object peekVariable(String key)
      Peeks a variable from the first ExpressionEngine that contains it.
      Parameter:
      key - The variable key to peek.
      Gibt zurück:
      The value of the variable, or null if not found in any engine.

    • getVariable

      public Object getVariable(String key)
      Gets a variable from the first ExpressionEngine that contains it.
      Parameter:
      key - The variable key to retrieve.
      Gibt zurück:
      The value of the variable, or null if not found in any engine.
